Package edu.ncsu.csc.coffee_maker.controllers

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    APICoffeeController
    This is the single controller in the CoffeeMaker application that handles REST API endpoints In a larger application, we would want multiple REST API controllers, one per model.
    APIController
    Base class for all of the API controllers for manipulating DomainObjects.
    APIInventoryController
    This is the controller that holds the REST endpoints that handle add and update operations for the Inventory.
    APIRecipeController
    This is the controller that holds the REST endpoints that handle CRUD operations for Recipes.
    APITest
    Perform a quick check of one of the API methods to ensure that the API controller is up and receiving requests as it should be
    DeleteRecipeController
    Controller class for deleting a recipe.
    EditRecipeController
    Controller class for the edit recipe page of CoffeeMaker.
    IndexController
    Controller class for the index (or front page) of CoffeeMaker.
    InventoryController
    Controller class for the inventory page of CoffeeMaker.
    InventoryControllerTest
    Tests the InventoryController and that inventory is displayed and added correctly.
    MakeCoffeeController
    Controller class for making coffee.
    RecipeController
    Controller class for adding a recipe.
